channel.title: SAP Cloud For Utilities
channel.description: Recent content on SAP Cloud For Utilities

item.description: Extending Cloud for Utilities (C4U CO) This document provides a step-by-step process to extend C4U CO while also providing in depth technical information that will allow you to extend C4U CO functionality for your use cases. C4U CO is built upon the SAP Cloud Application Programming Model framework which allows C4U CO to focus on exposing its vast domain expertise by: Focusing on the core domain and domain logic.
Extending Cloud for Utilities (C4U CO) Process Overview The following diagram shows the overall process that the extension developer will follow to create an extension:
